comments: Very strict on attendance and lab time, lectures were fairly boring but got the point across if you could pay attention. Tough tests, study basically everything you were showntold in class. Writes lecture notes on whiteboard, to make sure to have laptopnotepad for everything. She shows no pity for those who don\'t show up to lectures
